message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a starting price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that could benefit you greatly.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned.

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your perspective on the price, the value of this product is considerably higher. I'm willing to come down to $18,000.  This is a very competitive offer considering the  benefits it provides.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $15,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value you mentioned earlier.
